sub_title: Lead Solution Engineer @Salesforce | Driving customer success
summary:
As a Lead Solution Engineer at Salesforce, I help customers achieve their missions and goals by designing and delivering innovative solutions using the Salesforce platform. I have over 10 years of experience in Salesforce consulting, administration, and development, and I hold multiple Salesforce certifications, including Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Community Cloud, and Platform App Builder.

In addition, I am a certified Agile Coach and Scrum Expert, with a Professional Scrum Master and a Professional Scrum Product Owner credential from Scrum.org. I have successfully applied Agile principles and practices to multiple projects, facilitating collaboration, communication, and alignment among cross-functional teams and stakeholders. I am passionate about enabling digital transformation, social impact and innovation with Salesforce and Agile methodologies.

Certified Agile Coach:
- [PSM I] Professional Scrum Master I
- [PSPO I] Professional Scrum Product Owner I

Certified Salesforce Consultant:
- Salesforce Certified Administrator
- Salesforce Certified Service Cloud Consultant
- Salesforce Certified Sales Cloud Consultant
- Salesforce Certified Community Cloud Consultant
- Salesforce Certified Platform App Builder

projects.title: Salesforce.com Developer @ Maxxium
projects.description:
Maxxium and Edrington continuously strive to make their sales and customer service process more efficient. A big part of this is the global rollout of a new CRM system using Salesforce and a custom built mobile application using the Salesforce Mobile SDK. 

As a business analist and Salesforce developer I was responsible for the delivery of requirements and alignment between business needs and delivered functionality.

projects.title: PMO and BID Support @ Immigratie- en Naturalisatiedienst (IND)
projects.description: The Immigratie- en Naturalisatiedienst (IND) requests a tender for the upgrade of the INDiGO application. Roeland was asked to assist in the BID Project to help achieve the four alleged cases. The IND requested 11 resumes that ensured the quality and availability of staff. Roeland has played a important role in the scoring, ranking, selection and optimization of the resumes that are delivered. He showed initiative, hard work, discipline, perseverance and organizational skills. Moreover Roeland is a congenial and pleasant colleague to work with.

projects.title: Training Oracle User Productivity Kit @ KPN
projects.description: KPN is a leading supplier of Telecommunication- and IT- services in the Netherlands and offers consumers fixed and mobile telephone services, internet and television. Within KPN new software is being developed and end users need to be trained in the usage of this software. Roeland has developed training materials for KPN and trained end users during several days in the use of UPK.

profile_positions.title: [Interim] Product Owner NG Service & Voice of Customer

profile_positions.description:
As Solution Engineer I help companies transform digitally and help unleash the full potential of Salesforce. I leverage my technical and/or sales skills, including the ability to solicit business requirements, develop a technical sales strategy, configure and effectively demonstrate the solutions that address these requirements and provide business value. 

I am responsible for presenting product offerings and architecture in the best light to prospects and customers, to evoke confidence in 7Dots, and to remove all technical objections in the sales cycle.
profile_positions.title: Solutions Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Appsolutely is a Salesforce implementation and development company that helps organisations with their digital transformation.

We are a passionate group of people with the ambition to bring innovative cloud solutions to the market. 

We are a full service implementation firm offering end to end Integrations, full cycle application development and on-going customer support. 

Specialties
Salesforce, App Cloud, Appexchange, CRM, Customer Service, Salesforce development, Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, and Product Development
profile_positions.title: Senior Salesforce Consultant, Digital Transformation and Agile Coach

profile_positions.description:
Many existing companies face the challenge to prolong the life cycle of existing business and simultaneously grow new business (mainly online and tech). However, at present, the income from new business is often limited and uncertain.

At InnoLeaps we help existing medium sized companies, corporates and multinationals to think and act like startups. We arm corporate teams to anticipate future market developments, changes in market conditions and customer needs correctly. We help to translate this altered desired course then into new business models and speed-up customer and product development in order to shorten their time to market of new business.
profile_positions.title: Corporate Innovation and Program Manager

profile_positions.description: Digital Customer Experience (DCX) is a market-making and delivery support organization which consolidates Capgemini Group’s well established digital engagement expertise. DCX solutions are built upon unrivaled market understanding gained from our leading research with MIT, world-beating client experience, a culture of collaboration, a deep understanding of digital transformation across sectors and a global delivery footprint. By combining a deep understanding of the customer context with a single view of the enterprise, we enable organizations to take real-time decisions and drive business growth. Underpinned by a best-of-breed digital partner ecosystem, we provide a completely new spectrum of opportunities to our clients; we enable them to be closer to their customers with more personalized, relevant content, seamlessly delivered via multiple channels, in new innovative ways. Ultimately, our one-stop digital transformation capability helps CxOs to become digital leaders.
profile_positions.title: Digital Customer Experience and Salesforce Consultant
